examples: The teacher placed the books on the desk.

At a countryside farm festival, attendees line up for a taste of the famous trotter barbecue.
Summer is the season for outdoor concerts and festivals.
The music festival was a great way to break up the long winter months and add some excitement to our lives.
Surprisingly, the quiet neighborhood came alive with vibrant festivities during the annual festival.
words.defineEn: a period of time that is celebrated due to cultural or religious reasons
words.defineVi: một khoảng thời gian được tổ chức vì lý do văn hóa hoặc tôn giáo

examples: During this period the movies really came of age as an art form.
The make-or-break factor in this delicate post-course period is the attitude of the person's immediate superior.
Car-rental companies are running background checks on drivers who rent for long periods.
It’s time to close the book on this unfortunate period in our history.
A place that lets them be for whatever period they choose.
words.defineEn: a duration of time
words.defineVi: một khoảng thời gian

examples: Are you going home for Christmas.
I'm not looking forward to Christmas this year.
Christmas is a black day for us because Pop-Pop isn't here anymore.
We get two days off at Christmas and then it's back to the salt mines!
Clearing the decks before Christmas, that's my plan.
words.defineEn: the period of time around Christmas day, which includes the days just before or after it
words.defineVi: khoảng thời gian xung quanh ngày Giáng sinh, bao gồm những ngày ngay trước hoặc sau đó

examples: With the arrival of spring, he eagerly anticipated the first harvest of Prussian asparagus to prepare a traditional Easter brunch.
I love Easter candy.
It is, Easter?
Easter candy I think.
Today's announcement largely shut down the country through Easter and beyond.
words.defineEn: a holiday when Christians celebrate Jesus Christ's return to life after he died according to the Bible
words.defineVi: một ngày lễ khi các Kitô hữu kỷ niệm Chúa Giêsu Kitô trở lại cuộc sống sau khi ông chết theo Kinh thánh
